title: Google Latest articles summarisation
author: Shivam Patel
description: This Streamlit application retrieves the most recent articles, up to a specified number, from Google. It then generates individual summaries for each article and compiles them into a comprehensive summary, providing users with a concise overview of the latest content.

installDependencyCommands: pip install --no-cache-dir googlesearch-python==1.2.4 langchain==0.2.1 langchain-ibm==0.1.7 streamlit==1.33.0 beautifulsoup4==4.12.3
